Question: Prelaunch.com CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Prelaunch.com

Product Highlight at CES 2024

- Booth 9577, LVCC, North Hall
- Approach to product validation and launch insights
- Wall of Failures showcasing failed innovations
- Mission to help businesses understand customer needs
- Virtual booth experience available
- Focus on e-bike market growth and product launch support
Summary_cn:
Prelaunch.com

2024年国际消费电子展（CES）新品亮点

- 展位9577，拉斯维加斯会议中心北馆
- 产品验证和推出见解方法
- 展示失败创新的“失败墙”
- 旨在帮助企业了解客户需求
- 提供虚拟展位体验
- 关注电动自行车市场增长和产品推出支持
